column4: ahem oh yeah now remember the question I wanted to ask. I checked to see if Eclipse is installed which it is. I want to use it for web development, but don't know the name of the executable file? Anyone?
eclipse, but its also in the application menu
That was what I tried, but alt+F2 didn't execute it. I checked the software center and it shows installed...hmmmm
odd, try opening a console and typing eclipse, hit tab and see what comes up
Also this didn't run the executable...
